compliance.title: 1. Privacy Policy
compliance.body: We handle personal information in line with applicable laws, regulations, and related guidelines, including Japan's Act on the Protection of Personal Information.

safety.body: We take organizational, physical, human, and technical measures to protect personal information from leakage, loss, or damage.

disposal.body: When personal information is no longer needed for its purpose, we delete or dispose of it in an appropriate manner to prevent external leakage.
